message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000.
Alice, while I appreciate your offer, it's unfortunately a bit higher than my budget. I'd be willing to purchase the product for $12,000. Let me know if this is something we can work with.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $14,000.
Alice, $14,000 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $13,000.  This is my final offer, let me know if you're willing to accept.
I understand that $13,000 is a bit lower than my initial price, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13,500.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,500 is still a little more than I'm comfortable paying. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $13,000. If this is not acceptable, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand that you're sticking to your offer, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $13,000 and $13,500. I'll sell the product to you for $13,250.
